entry.title: We're glad you're here, Evan
entry.summary:
Author: Emgiehae

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,970Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: ??? Does this mean you will be alone for thanksgiving?Evan I‚Äôll text my sister, but yeah, probably. And my roommates are going out of town and none of them have asked me so yeah probably.??? You‚Äôre in Los Angeles, then, yes? Well, you can have a plate at my table, Evan. No one should spend a holiday alone.Or: Buck texts Maddie to ask her her plans for thanksgiving, except he puts in the wrong area code and ends up texting a stranger. The stranger? Isabel Diaz. She firmly believes that it was fate that had him text her. So what does she do? Invite the stranger over for Thanksgiving, of course!

entry.title: Soul of Water
entry.summary:
Author: PaperFirefly

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,977Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 39

Summary: Buck made a friend as a child that would stay with him from that day on. That friend just so happened to be a spirited little water elemental. A promise has kept their bond a secret his entire life, but now that Buck is older, and a very perceptive Eddie Diaz has entered the picture, keeping his secret might not be as easy, or necessary, as he thought. Follow Buck as he learns more about his bond and abilities, all while dragging an unaware Eddie and Chris along for the ride.

entry.title: S3 Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,515Chapters: 3/14Kudos: 33

Summary: Buck could ring her hands over and over. it was bad enough that she got blown up by a fire truck. It was bad enough she'd spent 5 months under lock and key. She really does not need to be dealing with all this bullshit, whatever god looks after humanity is cruel. At least now she has somebody to lean on, at least now Eddie knows the truth and she'll be back on the team soon enough. TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: It's a small world, after all. (buddie)
entry.summary:
Author: clover1barelyknowher

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,708Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: When he reached the top and wasn‚Äôt immediately roped into a new betting pool, he felt something was off. He walked forward to where his 118 family was crowding around a stranger. A stranger with Diaz on his back. ‚ÄúDiaz?‚Äù he questioned. The guy turned around, and boy was Buck glad of his wish now. ‚ÄúEddie?‚Äù he gasped. ‚ÄúBuck!‚Äù the man responded, wrapping him in a tight hug. It was brief and very macho. The rest of the team didn‚Äôt hide their shock towards this interaction. ‚ÄúPardon?‚Äù ‚ÄúWait, what?‚Äù ‚ÄúYou know Buck?‚Äù ‚ÄúYou know Eddie?‚Äù The two men chuckled. ‚ÄúYeah- actually we met yesterday..when Maddie took me to Disney!‚Äù Buck explained. OR Buck and Eddie meet at Disneyland when there's a miscommunication between the disability line and the single-rider lane.

entry.title: what is dead is restless & what is living is burning
entry.summary:
Author: bugbugly

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,971Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 35

Summary: Maddie is fourteen when her brother dies, and two days later her parents pack their lives up into the car and tell her it‚Äôs time to go. Only, there‚Äôs something injured sitting in the back seat and nobody will tell her what it is. Buck knows that he‚Äôs missing some years from his childhood and that the accident that took them from him is the same one that left him with patchwork scars all over his body. He just doesn‚Äôt realize that those years aren‚Äôt missing like a lost thing, but like a thing that was never there to begin with. They‚Äôre both dealing with it.

entry.title: Echoes In The Dark
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,364Chapters: 3/40Kudos: 10

Summary: Evan Buckley wasn't always Evan Buckley. His real name is Ethan Matthews, and when he was eight years old he was stuck in a town he couldn't escape, but he did with his sister. Now years later, hiding his past things start to come out. Or, Buck is Ethan and Maddie is Julie from FROM. They got out after Jim died. Changed their names. Years later things start coming out. You don't have to watch from to read this, I'll give enough information throughout the fic.

entry.title: Until I Found You...
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,963Chapters: 10/64Kudos: 118

Summary: Buck meets a guy in the grocery store, things, well escalate. Basically Buck gets a stalker, and enters a relationship with an abusive malipulative creep. Joe Goldberg was almost ready to leave LA with Henry, after killing his wife, Love Quinn.But when he stops at the grocery store on his way to the airport, he sees Buck and Buck has become his new obsession. Set after season 3 of You.Season 9 of 911.Bobby is alive, because that's how it should be. The story alternates POVs. Will be stated who POV it is. Mainly Joe and Buck, but others will have a random POV chapter here and there. Note: You don't have to watch YOU to read this. I'll provide enough context to get the idea. It's mostly set in the 911 universe. In this Joe never gives up Henry. Or,Buck is Joe Goldberg's new obsession.

Author: Wemily

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,149Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 10

Summary: A little bit later, both men were halfway through their third beers and feeling pleasantly buzzed as the song 'Before He Cheats' by Carrie Underwood began playing. Buck really hated that he related so hard to this song now, and the rage burning in his blood made him think he'd like to do exactly that to Tommy's truck. The curly-haired man knew that he shouldn't fantasize about destroying his ex's truck, but oh, did the thought make him want to smile.He must have looked manic because Eddie raised an eyebrow at him and asked, "Why are you smiling like that, man?"Buck hummed, "Hmm‚Ä¶ Just thinking.""About what exactly?""About how much I'd like to reenact this song on Tommy's truck. It could be the beer and the underlying rage talking, but god, destroying his truck sounds amazing right now." The blue-eyed man groaned.
